snippet: A house fire believed to have been caused by an unattended oven killed four people, including two children, and left four other residents injured Thursday, the authorities said.
abstract: Authorities in Lancaster, Pa, say a house fire believed to have been caused by an unattended oven kills four people, including two children, and leaves four other residents injured.
lead_paragraph: A house fire believed to have been caused by an unattended oven killed four people, including two children, and left four other residents injured Thursday, the authorities said.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Fire Kills 4 and Injures 4 Others
